     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Sustainability: Digging Deeper &nbsp;
      </span>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17355782">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17355782">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17355782">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I get the Full-text of my article?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10390246">
          <p>
           To get the full-text of an article:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in a library database with "Get-it" buttons, click on "Get-it." This button will take you the full text of your article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library,
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           the book or article.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (title, author, etc.), type the information about your article into
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discovery">
            Encompass
           </a>
           . Find the article on the results list, and click on the title. If you have access to the article via Trexler Library, a link to full text or view-now will be provided.&nbsp; If not, you can request a copy of the article by clicking the "Request Item" button.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, you can also search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. Look to the far right of the article's title to see if there is a link to a freely available copy.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10390246" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17355906">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17355906">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17355906">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17355906">
          <div id="boxatt17355906" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20430243">
              <a id="link_20430243" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430243,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430243}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430355">
              <a id="link_20430355" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=eric" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430355,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430355}); ">
               ERIC
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and professional journals, books, documents, and more in education and related areas.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430242">
              <a id="link_20430242" href="http://scholar.google.com/advanced_scholar_search?hl=en&amp;as_sdt=0,39" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430242,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430242}); ">
               Google Scholar - Biology, Medicine, and Life Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search the Biology, Life Sciences, Environmental Sciences, Medicine, Pharmacology, and Veterinary Science sections of Google Scholar. Links may take you to free full text, or search the library's site for full text access.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430244">
              <a id="link_20430244" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430244,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430244}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430239">
              <a id="link_20430239" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430239,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430239}); ">
               Science Direct, Health, Life, and Physical Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences from 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430240">
              <a id="link_20430240" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.springerlink.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430240,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430240}); ">
               Springerlink
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 1,700 journals from Springer-Verlag with coverage from 1997 to present. Subjects covered focus on the natural sciences, but also include significant titles in behavioral sciences, humanities, social sciences and law.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17355868">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17355868">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17355868">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Websites Relating to Sustainable Colleges and Universities
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17355868">
          <div id="boxatt17355868" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20430201">
              <a id="link_20430201" href="http://www.aashe.org/forums" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430201,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430201}); ">
               Campus Sustainability Discussion Forums
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Discussions on topics for creating sustainable campuses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430870">
              <a id="link_20430870" href="http://www.epa.gov/compost/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430870,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430870}); ">
               EPA Compositing Portal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430202">
              <a id="link_20430202" href="http://www.epa.gov/sustainability/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430202,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430202}); ">
               EPA Sustainability Site
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Environmental Protection Agency's guide to sustainable practices
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430853">
              <a id="link_20430853" href="http://www.usgbc.org/leed" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430853,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430853}); ">
               LEED
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               LEED is a program that provides third party certification of green buildings.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430207">
              <a id="link_20430207" href="http://www.climate.gov/#climateWatch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430207,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430207}); ">
               NOAA Climate Service Portal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An interactive tool from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration that lets users see a range of constantly updating climate datasets over adjustable time scales.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430810">
              <a id="link_20430810" href="https://stars.aashe.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430810,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430810}); ">
               STARS
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Sustainability Tracking, Assessment &amp; Rating Systemâ„¢ (STARS) is a transparent, self-reporting framework for colleges and universities to measure their sustainability performance.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17355894">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17355894">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17355894">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308172">
          <div id="boxatt17308172" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20381358">
              <a id="link_20381358" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20381358,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search within the text of books and then click on "Find in a Library" to submit an interlibrary loan request for the complete text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17355918">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17355918">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17355918">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17355918">
          <div id="boxatt17355918" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20430290">
              <a id="link_20430290" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://chronicle.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430290,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430290}); ">
               Chronicle of Higher Education
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News about and relevant to colleges and universities
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430252">
              <a id="link_20430252" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430252,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430252}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430253">
              <a id="link_20430253" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430253,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sustainability: Digging Deeper', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430253}); ">
               Science Daily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News articles, videos, and images in the subjects of health, math, and the sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
